title: Subspace Tester
description: Interactive visualization to test whether sets are subspaces by checking closure under linear combinations.
creator: Claude AI
subject: Linear Algebra
Vector Spaces
Subspaces
Linear Combinations

learningObjectives: Test whether sets are subspaces by checking closure under linear combinations
Identify counter-examples that prove a set is not a subspace
Understand the three properties required for a subspace
Visualize why certain common sets fail the subspace test

controls.name: Set Type
controls.description: Choose the set to test for subspace properties

controls.name: Check if Subspace
controls.description: Evaluates whether the current linear combination stays in the set and explains the result

controls.name: Reset
controls.description: Resets all vectors, scalars, and set selection to defaults

controls.name: Vector endpoints
controls.description: Drag to reposition vectors u and v (constrained to the selected set)
